hero.subtitle: IT Infrastructure Manager | DevOps Engineer | Fullstack Developer
hero.bio:
IT Infrastructure Manager with experience in networks, servers, and level 3 support, ensuring the stability and continuity of critical systems.
My technical background, combined with experience in infrastructure, development, and advanced English level (C2), makes me a versatile professional for international projects.
In addition, I have experience in Full Stack Development (Angular and Java), which provides me with a comprehensive perspective to solve problems with real impact.
